translations.text: And We showered Our blessings on him and on Ishaq; and of their offspring are the doers of good, and (also) those who are clearly unjust to their own souls.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wabarakna AAalayhi waAAala ishaqa wamin thurriyyatihima muhsinun wathalimun linafsihi mubeenun

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and blessed him and Isaac too: some of their offspring were good, but some clearly sinned against their souls.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: We blessed him and Isaac: but of their progeny are (some) that do right, and (some) that obviously do wrong, to their own souls.

verses.text: وَ لَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَى‌ مُوسَى‌ وَ هَارُونَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و به راستی ما به موسی و هارون نعمت دادیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: ما به موسى و هارون نعمت داديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و به راستى به موسى و هارون موهبت داديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و در حقيقت، بر موسى و هارون منت نهاديم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و همانا ما بر موسی و هارون منّت گذاردیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: ما به موسی و هارون واقعاً نعمتهای گرانبهائی بخشیدیم. [[«لَقَدْ مَنَنَّا ...»: واقعاً نعمتهای گرانبها و ارزشمندی دادیم، منّت، اگر جنبه عملی داشته باشد، زیبا و پسندیده است و مراد نعمتهای بزرگ و سنگین است. و اگر با لفظ و سخن باشد، زشت و بدنما است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و به راستی بر موسی و هارون منت نهادیم [و نعمت دادیم‌]

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: ما به موسی و هارون نعمت بخشیدیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و همانا منّت نهادیم بر موسی و هارون‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هر آينه بر موسى و هارون منت نهاديم- به قطع گزندها و آسيب‌ها از ايشان، يا به نعمت نبوت-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و به‌راستی بر موسی و هارون بسی منّت نهادیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: We were indeed gracious to Moses and Aaron,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And We indeed did a great favour to Moosa and Haroon.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: We also favoured Moses and Aaron,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And assuredly We gave grace Unto Musa and Harun.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And, indeed We gave Our Grace to Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We blessed Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Verily We bestowed Our favours on Moses and Aaron

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And, indeed We gave Our grace to Musa and Harun.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And We verily gave grace unto Moses and Aaron,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Certainly We favoured Moses and Aaron,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: We also favored Moses and Aaron

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: We certainly bestowed Our favor upon Moses and Aaron

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And certainly We conferred a favor on Musa and Haroun.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Walaqad mananna AAala moosa waharoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: We also bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron:

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Again (of old) We bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron,

verses.text: وَ نَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَ قَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ‌ الْکَرْبِ‌ الْعَظِيمِ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و آن دو نفر و قومشان را از اندوه بزرگ نجات بخشیدیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آن دو و مردمشان را از رنجى بزرگ نجات بخشيديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و آن دو و قومشان را از محنتى بزرگ نجات داديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و آن دو و قومشان را از اندوه بزرگ رهانيديم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هر دو را با قومشان از بلای بزرگ (فرعونیان) نجات دادیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آنان و قوم ایشان را از غم و اندوه بزرگ (اذیّت و آزار فرعون و فرعونیان) نجات دادیم. [[«الْکَرْبِ الْعَظِیمِ»: (نگا: انبیاء / 76، صافّات / 76).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: آن دو و قومشان را از گرفتاری بزرگ رهانیدیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و آن دو و قومشان را از اندوه بزرگ نجات دادیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و رهاشان ساختیم و قومشان را از اندوه بزرگ‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و آن دو و قومشان را از اندوه بزرگ رهانيديم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و آن دو و قومشان را از بلای بزرگ رهانیدیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And saved them and their people from great distress,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And rescued them and their people from the great calamity.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and We delivered them and their people from the great distress.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And delivered them and their people from the great affliction.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And We saved them and their people from the great distress;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We delivered them and their people from the terrible disaster.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and We delivered both of them and their people from the great calamity.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And We saved them and their people from the great distress,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And saved them and their people from the great distress,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and delivered them and their people from their great distress,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and We saved them with their nation from a great distress.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and saved them and their people from great distress.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We delivered them both and their people from the mighty distress.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wanajjaynahuma waqawmahuma mina alkarbi alAAatheemi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: We saved them and their people from great distress;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We delivered them and their people from (their) Great Calamity;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و آنان را یاری دادیم در نتیجه پیروز شدند،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آنان را يارى داديم تا پيروز شدند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و آنان را يارى داديم تا ايشان غالب آمدند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و آنان را يارى داديم تا ايشان غالب آمدند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و آنها را یاری دادیم تا (بر فوعونیان) به حقیقت غالب شدند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و آنان را یاری کردیم تا (بر دشمنانشان) پیروز شدند. [[«نَصَرْنَاهُمْ»: ایشان را یاری دادیم. یعنی موسی و هارون و قوم بنی‌اسرائیل را.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و آنان را یاری دادیم و آنان بودند که پیروز شدند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و آنها را یاری کردیم تا بر دشمنان خود پیروز شدند!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و یاریشان کردیم پس شدند چیرگان (پیروزمندان)

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و ياريشان كرديم تا چيره و پيروز شدند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و آنان را یاری دادیم، پس (هم)آ‎نان چیرگان بودند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And helped them, so they were victorious.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And We helped them, so they were victorious.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: And We helped them, so that they were the victors;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And We succoured them so that they became overcomers.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And helped them, so that they became the victors;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We supported them, and so they were the victors.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: We succoured them, and they gained the upper hand (against their enemies).

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And helped them, so that they became the victors;

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And helped them so that they became the victors.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and We helped them so that they became the victors.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: We helped them, and they became victorious,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: We helped them and they were victorious.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We helped them, so they were the vanquishers.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wanasarnahum fakanoo humu alghalibeena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and We helped them, so that they were victorious;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We helped them, so they overcame (their troubles);

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و هر دو را کتاب بسیار روشنگر عطا کردیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و كتابى روشنگرشان داديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و آن دو را كتاب روشنگر داديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و آن دو را كتاب روشن داديم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و به آن دو (پیغمبر) کتاب (تورات) روشن بیان را عطا کردیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و به آن دو، کتاب روشنگر (احکام دین، و بیانگر رهنمودهای امور زندگی آن روزی) عطاء کردیم (که تورات است). [[«الْمُسْتَبِینَ»: واضح و روشن. روشنگر و بیانگر (نگا: انعام / 55).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و به آن دو، کتاب روشنگر بخشیدیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: ما به آن دو، کتاب روشنگر دادیم،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و بدیشان دادیم نامه روشن‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و كتابى روشن و روشنگر بداديمشان.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و آن دو را کتاب روشنی‌خواه دادیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: We gave them the explicit Book,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And We bestowed the clear Book to both of them.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and We gave them the Manifesting Book,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And We vouchsafed Unto the twain a Book luminous.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And We gave them the clear Scripture;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We gave them the Clarifying Scripture.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: We granted them a Clear Book,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And We gave them the clear Scripture;

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And We gave them the clear Scripture

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: We gave them the illuminating scripture

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and We gave them the Clear Book,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: We gave them the enlightening Book,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We gave them both the Book that made (things) clear.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waataynahuma alkitaba almustabeena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: وبه راه راست هدایتشان نمودیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و به راه راست هدايتشان كرديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هر دو را به راه راست هدايت كرديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هر دو را به راه راست هدايت كرديم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هر دو را به راه راست (خداپرستی) هدایت کردیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و آن دو را به راه راست رهنمود کردیم (که راه انبیاء و اولیاء است، و خطر انحراف و گمراهی و سقوط در آن وجود ندارد). [[«الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِیمَ»: (نگا: فاتحه / 6).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و آن دو را به راه راست هدایت کردیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و آن دو را به راه راست هدایت نمودیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و رهبریشان کردیم به راهی راست‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هر دو را راه راست بنموديم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هر دو را به راه راست - به‌گونه‌ای مماس - رهبری کردیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And showed them the straight path,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And guided them to the Straight Path.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and guided them in the straight path,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And We led the twain on Unto the straight path.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And guided them to the Right Path;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We guided them upon the straight path.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and showed them the Straight Way,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And guided them to the right path.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And showed them the right path.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and guided them to the straight path,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and guided them upon the Straight Path.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We guided them on the straight path.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: guided them to the right path,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We guided them both on the right way.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wahadaynahuma alssirata almustaqeema

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and guided them to the straight path;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We guided them to the Straight Way.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و در میان آیندگان برای هر دو نفر نام نیک به جا گذاشتیم.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و نام نيكشان را در نسلهاى بعد باقى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و براى آن دو در [ميان‌] آيندگان [نام نيك‌] بر جاى نهاديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و براى آن دو در [ميان‌] آيندگان [نام نيك‌] به جاى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و برایشان نام نیک در میان آیندگان باقی گذاردیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و نام نیک آنان را در اقوام بعد باقی گذاردیم. [[«وَ تَرَکْنا عَلَیْها ...»: (نگا: صافّات / 78 و 108).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و برای آنان در میان واپسینان نام نیک نهادیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و نام نیکشان را در اقوام بعد باقی گذاردیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و بازگذاردیم بر ایشان در بازماندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و برايشان نام و ثناى نيك در پسينيان باقى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و بر آن دو در (میان) آیندگان (نام نیک) واگذاشتیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And left (their remembrance) for posterity.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And We kept their praise among the latter generations.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and left for them among the later folk

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And We left for the twain among the posterity:

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And We left for them (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We left with them for later generations.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and preserved for them a good name among posterity.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And We left for them among the later generations.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And We left for them among the later folk (the salutation):

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and left for them a good name in posterity.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: And We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon on both of them in the latter (generations),

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and perpetuated their praise in later generations.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We perpetuated (praise) to them among the later generations.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhima fee alakhireena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and We left them thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among later generations:

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We left (this blessing) for them among generations (to come) in later times:

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: سلام بر موسی و هارون.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: سلام بر موسى و هارون.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: سلام بر موسى و هارون

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: درود بر موسى و هارون!

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: سلام و تحیّت بر موسی و هارون باد.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: درود بر موسی و هارون! [[«سَلامٌ عَلی ...»: (نگا: صافّات / 78 و 108).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: سلام بر موسی و هارون‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: سلام بر موسی و هارون!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: سلام بر موسی و هارون‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: سلام بر موسى و هارون.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: سلامی (ربانی) بر موسی و هارون!

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Peace be on Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Peace be upon Moosa and Haroon!

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: 'Peace be upon Moses and, Aaron!'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Peace be Unto Musa and Harun.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Salamun (peace) be upon Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron)!"

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Salam (peace!) be upon Musa and Harun!"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Peace be unto Moses and Aaron!

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: ‘Peace be to Moses and Aaron!’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: 'Peace be upon Moses and Aaron'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Peace be with Moses and Aaron.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Peace be on Musa and Haroun.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Salamun AAala moosa waharoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: "Peace be upon Moses and Aaron!"

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: "Peace and salutation to Moses and Aaron!"

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: ما نیکوکاران را این گونه پاداش می دهیم.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: ما نيكوكاران را اينچنين پاداش مى‌دهيم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: به راستى ما نيكوكاران را چنين پاداش مى‌دهيم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: ما نيكوكاران را چنين پاداش مى‌دهيم،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: ما چنین نیکوان را پاداش نیکو می‌دهیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: ما این گونه نیکوکاران را پاداش می‌دهیم. [[«إِنّا کَذلِکَ ...»: (نگا: انعام / 84، یوسف / 22، قصص / 14).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: ما بدین‌سان نیکوکاران را جزا می‌دهیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: ما این گونه نیکوکاران را پاداش می‌دهیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: بدینسان پاداش دهیم به نکوکاران‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: همانا ما نيكوكاران را چنين پاداش مى‌دهيم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: بی‌گمان ما نیکوکاران را چنان پاداش می‌دهیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That is how We reward those who do good.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily, thus do We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers - see V. 2:112).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Thus We reward the righteous.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Thus do We reward the good-doers.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, thus do We reward the doers of good.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Lo! thus do We reward the good.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Thus indeed do We reward the virtuous.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: As such We recompense the gooddoers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Even thus do We reward the doers of good.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: This is how We reward those who do good:

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بی تردید هر دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آن دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: آن دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: زيرا آن دو از بندگان با ايمان ما بودند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: زیرا هر دو از بندگان خاص با ایمان ما بودند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آن دو نفر، از زمره‌ی بندگان مؤمن ما بودند. [[«مَا»: آنچه. مراد بت است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: که آن دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: آن دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: همانا بودند آنان از بندگان ما گروندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: زيرا كه هر دو از بندگان مؤمن ما بودند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: همانا آنان از بندگان باایمان مایند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: They are among Our faithful devotees.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Indeed they are two of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: they were among Our believing servants.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Verily the twain were of Our bondmen believing.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily! They were two of Our believing slaves.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: They were of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Surely both of them were among Our believing servants.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, they were two of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Lo! they are two of Our believing slaves.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: They are indeed among Our faithful servants.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: They were among Our believing worshipers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: They were two of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Surely they were both of Our believing servants.

translations.text: Innahuma min AAibadina almumineena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: truly they were among Our faithful servants.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: For they were two of our believing Servants.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و بی تردید الیاس از پیامبران بود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و الياس از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و به راستى الياس از فرستادگان [ما] بود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و به راستى الياس از فرستادگان [ما] بود.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و همانا الیاس یکی از رسولان بزرگ خدا بود.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: الیاس از پیغمبران بود. [[«إِلْیَاسَ»: یکی از پیغمبران بنی‌اسرائیل و از نسل هارون 7 بود.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و همانا الیاس از پیامبران بود

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و الیاس از رسولان (ما) بود!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و همانا الیاس است از فرستادگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و همانا الياس از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و به‌راستی الیاس به‌درستی از فرستادگان ماست.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Verily Elias is one of the apostles.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And indeed Ilyas is one of the Noble Messengers.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Elias too was one of the Envoys;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And verily, llyas was one of the sent ones.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And verily, Iliyas (Elias) was one of the Messengers.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Also Elijah was one of the messengers.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Surely, Elias too was among the Messengers.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And verily, Ilyas was one of the Messengers.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn),

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Indeed Ilyas was one of the apostles.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: And Elias (El Yaseen) was among the Messengers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Elias was certainly a Messenger.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And Ilyas was most surely of the apostles.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wainna ilyasa lamina almursaleena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Elijah too was one of the messengers.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ‌ لِقَوْمِهِ‌ أَ لاَ تَتَّقُونَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [یاد کن] هنگامی را که به قومش گفت: آیا [از شرک وطغیان] نمی پرهیزید؟

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: به مردم خود گفت: آيا پروا نمى‌كنيد؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: هنگامى كه به قوم خود گفت: آيا پروا نمى‌داريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: چون به قوم خود گفت: «آيا پروا نمى‌داريد؟

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: وقتی که قومش را گفت: آیا خداترس و پرهیزکار نمی‌شوید (که ترک بت و خود پرستی کنید).

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: زمانی به قوم خود گفت: آیا پرهیزگاری پیشه‌ی خود نمی‌کنید؟

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: چنین بود که به قومش گفت آیا پروا نمی‌کنید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: به خاطر بیاور هنگامی را که به قومش گفت: «آیا تقوا پیشه نمی‌کنید؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: گاهی که گفت به قوم خویش چرا پرهیزکاری نکنید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آنگاه كه به قوم خود گفت: آيا پروا نمى‌كنيد؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: چون به قوم خود گفت: «آیا پروا نمی‌دارید؟»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: When he said to his people: "Will you not be mindful of God?

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: When he said to his people, “Do you not fear?”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: when he said to his people, 'Will you not be godfearing?

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Recall what time he said Unto his people: fear ye not?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: When he said to his people: "Will you not fear Allah?

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: He said to his people, “Do you not fear?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: (Call to mind) when he said to his people: “Will you not fear Allah?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: When he said to his people: "Will you not have Taqwa"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: When he said unto his folk: Will ye not ward off (evil)?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: When he said to his people, ‘Will you not be Godwary?

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: He asked his people: 'Do you not fear (Allah)?

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: He told his people, "Why do you not have fear of God?

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: When he said to his people: Do you not guard (against evil)?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Ith qala liqawmihi ala tattaqoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: He said to his people, "Have you no fear [of God?]

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Behold, he said to his people, "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

verses.text: أَ تَدْعُونَ‌ بَعْلاً وَ تَذَرُونَ‌ أَحْسَنَ‌ الْخَالِقِينَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: آیا بت «بعل» را می پرستید و بهترین آفرینندگان را رها می کنید؟!

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آيا بَعل را به خدايى مى‌خوانيد، و آن بهترين آفرينندگان را وامى‌گذاريد؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: آيا بت «بعل» را مى‌پرستيد و بهترين آفرينندگان را وا مى‌گذاريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: آيا «بعل» را مى‌پرستيد و بهترين آفرينندگان را وامى‌گذاريد؟!

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: آیا بت بعل نام را (خدا) می‌خوانید و خدای بهترین آفریننده عالم را ترک می‌گویید؟

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آیا بت بعل را به فریاد می‌خوانید (و نیازمندیهای خود را از او می‌خواهید) و آیا بهترین آفرینندگان را رها می‌سازید؟! [[«تَدْعُونَ»: به فریاد می‌خوانید (نگا: انعام / 40 و 41). «بَعْلاً»: نام بت معیّنی در بعلبک. هر نوع معبودی که به وسیله آن به خدا تقرّب جویند. جمع آن بُعول است. «أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِینَ»: (نگا: مؤمنون / 14). خالق به معنی مقدّر و اندازه گیرنده، و یا به معنی آفریدگار است. بت‌پرستان معتقد بودند که بتهایشان آفریننده بوده و در کار آفرینش دست دارند (نگا: مجمع‌البیان الحدیث). «تَذَرُونَ»: (نگا: بقره / 234، شعراء / 166).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: آیا بعل را می‌پرستید و بهترین آفریدگاران را رها می‌کنید؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: آیا بت «بعل» را می‌خوانید و بهترین آفریدگارها را رها می‌سازید؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: آیا می‌خوانید بعل را و می‌گذارید (رها کنید) بهترین آفرینندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آيا بت بعل را مى‌خوانيد- مى‌پرستيديد- و نيكوترين آفرينندگان را وا مى‌گذاريد؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «آیا (بتِ) بعل را می‌خوانید (و می‌پرستید) و بهترین آفرینندگان را وامی‌گذارید؟!»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Would you call on Baal and leave the best of creators,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “What! You worship Baal (an idol) and leave the Best Creator?” –

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Do you call on Baal, and abandon the Best of creators?

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Call ye upon Bal and forsake the Best of creators.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "Will you call upon Ba'l (a well- known idol of his nation whom they used to worship) and forsake the Best of creators,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Do you call on Baal, and forsake the Best of creators?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Do you call upon Baal and forsake the Best of the Creators?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Will you call upon `Ba`l and forsake the Best of creators,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Will ye cry unto Baal and forsake the Best of creators,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Do you invoke Baal and abandon the best of creators,

translations.text: Do you call on Ba'lan (the idol Baal) and abandon the Best Creator,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Do you worship Ba`al and abandon the Best Creator.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: What! do you call upon Ba'l and forsake the best of the creators,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: AtadAAoona baAAlan watatharoona ahsana alkhaliqeena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Do you call on Baal and abandon the Best of Creators,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: "Will ye call upon Baal and forsake the Best of Creators,-

verses.text: اللَّهَ‌ رَبَّکُمْ‌ وَ رَبَ‌ آبَائِکُمُ‌ الْأَوَّلِينَ‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: خدا را که پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران پیشین شماست.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پروردگار شما و پروردگار نياكانتان، خداى يكتاست.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: خدا را [ترك مى‌كنيد] كه پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران پيشين شماست

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: [يعنى:] خدا را كه پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران پيشين شماست؟!

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: همان خدایی که آفریننده شما و پدران گذشته شماست (نه بتان جماد).

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: خدا، که معبود شما و معبود نیاکان پیشین شما است. [[«أللهَ»: بدل (أَحْسَنَ) است. «رَبَّکُمْ»: عطف بیان یا بدل (اللهَ) یا صفت آن است. یا این که (اللهَ) بدل اوّل و (رَبَّکُمْ) بدل دوم (أَحْسَنَ) است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: خداوند را، که پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران نخستین شماست؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: خدایی که پروردگار شما و پروردگار نیاکان شماست!»

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: خدا را پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران شما پیشینیان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: همان خداى را، كه پروردگار شما و پروردگار پدران نخستين شماست.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «خدا، پروردگارتان و پروردگار پدران نخستینتان را؟!»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers?"

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “Allah – Who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: God, your Lord, and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients?'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?"

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: God is your Lord, and the Lord of your ancestors.”

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Allah is your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors of yore.”

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?,’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Allah is your Lord and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?"

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of yore?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Allaha rabbakum warabba abaikumu alawwaleena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: God your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?"

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: "Allah, your Lord and Cherisher and the Lord and Cherisher of your fathers of old?"

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پس او را انکار کردند، یقیناً آنان از احضار شدگان [در عذاب] خواهند بود،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس تكذيبش كردند و آنان از احضارشدگانند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: اما او را تكذيب كردند و قطعا آنها از احضار شدگانند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس او را دروغگو شمردند، و قطعاً آنها [در آتش‌] احضار خواهند شد-

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: قوم الیاس (رسالت) او را تکذیب کردند، بدین سبب (برای انتقام و عذاب به محشر) احضار می‌شوند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آنان الیاس را تکذیب کردند، پس ایشان (توسّط فرشتگان در دوزخ) گرد آورده می‌شوند. [[«لَمُحْضَرُونَ»: (نگا: قصص / 61، روم / 16، سبأ / 38).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس او را دروغگو شمردند و ایشان [برای حساب و عذاب‌] حاضر شدگانند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: امّا آنها او را تکذیب کردند؛ ولی به یقین همگی (در دادگاه عدل الهی) احضار می‌شوند!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس دروغش پنداشتند و همانا ایشانند فراخواندگان (احضارشدگان)

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس او را دروغگو شمردند، و هر آينه آنان حاضرشدگانند- براى عذاب-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس او را تکذیب کردند، پس (هم)ایشان همانا (برای حساب) احضار شدگانند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: They denied him, and will surely be brought to punishment,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: In response they denied him, so they will surely be brought forth as captives.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: But they cried him lies; so they will be among the arraigned,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Then they belied him, so verily they are to be brought up.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: But they denied him [Iliyas (Elias)], so they will certainly be brought forth (to the punishment),

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: But they called him a liar, and thus they will be brought forward.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: But they denounced him as a liar, so they will surely be arraigned (for punishment),

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: But they denied him, so they will certainly be brought forth,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: But they denied him, so they surely will be haled forth (to the doom)

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: they impugned him. So they will indeed be mustered [in hell]

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: But they belied him, so they will be among the arraigned (in Hell),

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: They called him a liar. Thus, all of them will suffer torment

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: But they called him a liar, therefore they shall most surely be brought up.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Fakaththaboohu fainnahum lamuhdaroona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: but they rejected him, and thus will certainly be called to account;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: جز بندگان خالص شده خدا [که از هر کیفری در امانند،]

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: مگر بندگان مخلص خدا.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: مگر بندگان خالص شده‌ى خدا

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: مگر بندگان پاكدين خدا.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: (و همه هلاک شوند) جز بندگان پاک و برگزیده خدا.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: مگر بندگان مخلص خدا (که ایشان رستگار و کامگارند). [[«إِلاّ عِبَادَ ...»: (نگا: صافّات / 40 و 74).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: مگر آن بندگان خداوند که اخلاص یافته‌اند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: مگر بندگان مخلص خدا!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: مگر بندگان خدا ناآلودگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: مگر بندگان ويژه و برگزيده خداى.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: مگر بندگان اخلاص‌یافته‌ی (از سوی) خدا (که بی‌حساب در رحمتند).

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Except the chosen creatures of God.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: except for God's sincere servants;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Except the bondmen of Allah sincere.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Except the chosen slaves of Allah.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Except for God’s sincere servants.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: except Allah's chosen servants.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Save the chosen servants of Allah.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Save single-minded slaves of Allah.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: —[all] except Allah’s exclusive servants.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: except the sincere worshipers of Allah.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Except the chosen servants of Allah.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: except the sincere servants of God.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: But not the servants of Allah, the purified ones.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Illa AAibada Allahi almukhlaseena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: except the chosen servants of God.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Except the sincere and devoted Servants of Allah (among them).

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و در میان آیندگان برای او نام نیک به جا گذاشتیم.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و نام نيك او را در نسلهاى بعد باقى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و براى او در [ميان‌] آيندگان [آوازه‌ى نيك‌] بر جاى نهاديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و براى او در [ميان‌] آيندگان [آوازه نيك‌] به جاى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و از او در میان آیندگان نام نیکو باقی گذاردیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و نام نیک او را در میان ملّتهای بعدی باقی گذاردیم. [[«تَرَکْنَا عَلَیْهِ ...»: (نگا: صافّات / 78 و 108 و 119).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و برای او در میان واپسینان نام نیک نهادیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: ما نام نیک او را در میان امّتهای بعد باقی گذاردیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و بازگذاردیم بر او در آیندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و براى او نام و ثناى نيك در پسينيان باقى گذاشتيم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و بر (سر و سامان)ش در (میان) آیندگان (آوازه‌ی نیک) واگذاشتیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And We left his (memory) for posterity.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and We left for him among the later folk

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And We left for him among the posterity:

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And We left for him (a goodly remembrance) among generations (to come) in later times;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And We left with him for later generations.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: We preserved a good name for him among posterity.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And We left for him among the later generations.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And we left for him among the later folk (the salutation):

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: We left for him a good name in posterity.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: And We let it (the beautiful praise) remain upon him in the latter (generations),

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: We perpetuated his praise in the later generations.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And We perpetuated to him (praise) among the later generations.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhi fee alakhireena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: We left him thus to be succeeded by a group [of followers] among the following generations --

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: سلام بر آل یاسین.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: سلام بر خاندان الياس.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: سلام بر الياس

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: درود بر پيروان الياس!

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: سلام بر الیاس (و آل یاسین) باد.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: درود بر الیاس! [[«إِلْ یَاسِینَ»: تلفّظ دیگر إلیاس است. همچون سَیْناء و سِینِینَ که هر دو نام سرزمین معیّنی است. یا إبراهیم و أبراهام، میکال و میکائیل و ... دیگر این که در آیه 132 که می‌فرماید: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنینَ. ضمیر مفرد به کار رفته است که مرجع آن إِلْ یاسینَ است. از سوی دیگر، در همین سوره، در آیات: سَلامٌ عَلی نُوحٍ (79) سَلامٌ عَلی إِبْرَاهِیمَ (109) سَلامٌ عَلی مُوسی وَ هَارُونَ (120) سلام صدر سخن آیه‌ها به همان پیغمبری برمی‌گردد که مذکور است. بنابراین در اینجا هم سلام بر الیاس است و بس نه پیروان الیاس، یعنی الیاسیها. به عبارت دیگر ال یاسین، جمع الیاسی نبوده تا بعد از تخفیف «الیاسین» شده باشد، همان گونه که برخی معتقدند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و سلام بر آل یاسین‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: سلام بر الیاسین!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: سلامی بر آل یاسین (یا خاندان الیاس)

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: سلام بر الياس.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: درودی (ربانی) بر اِل یاسین!

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Peace be on Elias.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Peace be upon Ilyas!

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: 'Peace be upon Elias!'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Peace be Unto Elyasin.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Salamun (peace) be upon Ilyasin (Elias)!"

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Peace be upon the House of Elijah.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Peace be upon Elias.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Salam (peace!) be upon Ilyasin!"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Peace be unto Elias!

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: ‘Peace be to Ilyas!’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: 'Peace be upon El Yaseen'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: "Peace upon Elias."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Peace be with the followers of Elias.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Peace be on Ilyas.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Salamun AAala il yaseena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: "Peace be on Elijah and his people!"

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: "Peace and salutation to such as Elias!"

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: ما نیکوکاران را این گونه پاداش می دهیم.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: ما نيكوكاران را اينچنين پاداش مى‌دهيم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: ما نيكوكاران را اين گونه پاداش مى‌دهيم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: ما نيكوكاران را اين گونه پاداش مى‌دهيم،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: ما نیکوان را چنین پاداش نیکو می‌دهیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: ما این چنین پاداش نیکوکاران را خواهیم داد. [[«إِنّا کَذلِکَ ...»: (نگا: صافّات / 80 و 105 و 110 و 121).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: ما بدین‌سان نیکوکاران را جزا می‌دهیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: ما این گونه نیکوکاران را پاداش می‌دهیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: که ما بدینسان پاداش دهیم نیکوکاران‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: همانا ما نيكوكاران را چنين پاداش مى دهيم،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: ما بی‌گمان نیکوکاران را اینگونه پاداش می‌دهیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That is how We reward those who do good.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Even so We recompense the good-doers;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily, thus do We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers, who perform good deeds totally for Allah's sake only - see V. 2:112).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Thus We reward the virtuous.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Thus do We reward the good-doers.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, thus do We reward the doers of good.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Lo! thus do We reward the good.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Thus indeed do We reward the virtuous.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: As such We recompense the gooddoers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: In this way do We reward the righteous ones.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Even thus do We reward the doers of good.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: It is thus indeed that We reward those who do good:

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بی تردید او از بندگان مؤمن ما بود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: او از بندگان مؤمن ما بود.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: همانا او از بندگان مؤمن ما بود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: زيرا او از بندگان با ايمان ما بود.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: زیرا او از بندگان خاص با ایمان ما بود.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: إلیاس از زمره‌ی بندگانِ با ایمان ما بود.

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: او از بندگان مؤمن ما بود

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: او از بندگان مؤمن ما است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: همانا او است از بندگان ما گروندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: زيرا كه او از بندگان مؤمن ما بود.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: به‌راستی او از بندگان باایمان ماست.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: He is truly among Our faithful devotees.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: he was among Our believing servants.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Verily he was one of Our bondmen believing.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily, he was one of Our believing slaves.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: He was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: He was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, he was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Lo! he is one of our believing slaves.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: He is indeed one of Our faithful servants.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: He was among Our believing worshipers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: He was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Surely he was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Innahu min AAibadina almumineena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: surely he was one of Our believing servants.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: For he was one of our believing Servants.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و بی تردید لوط از پیامبران بود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و لوط از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و البته لوط [نيز] از پيامبران بود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و در حقيقت، لوط از زمره فرستادگان بود.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و لوط هم یکی از رسولان خدا بود.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: قطعاً لوط از زمره‌ی پیغمبران بود.

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و همانا لوط از پیامبران بود

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و لوط از رسولان (ما) است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و هر آینه لوط است از فرستادگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هر آينه لوط از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و به‌راستی، لوط همانا از زمره‌ی فرستادگان (ما) است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Verily Lot was one of the apostles,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And indeed Lut is one of the Noble Messengers.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Lot too was one of the Envoys;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And verily Lut was of the sent ones.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And verily, Lout (Lot) was one of the Messengers.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And Lot was one of the messengers.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: And Lot too was one of the Messengers.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And verily, Lut was one of the Messengers.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And lo! Lot verily was of those sent (to warn).

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Indeed Lot was one of the apostles.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Lot, too, was among the Messengers.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Lot was certainly a Messenger.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And Lut was most surely of the apostles.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wainna lootan lamina almursaleena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Lot was also one of the messengers.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: So also was Lut among those sent (by Us).

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [یاد کن] هنگامی را که او و همه اهلش را نجات دادیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: او و همه كسانش را نجات داديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: آن‌گاه كه او و همه كسانش را نجات داديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: آنگاه كه او و همه كسانش را رهانيديم-

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: وقتی که ما (خواستیم قوم او را کیفر کنیم) او و اهل بیتش همه را نجات دادیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: زمانی، او و جملگی خاندان و پیروان او را نجات دادیم. [[«أَهْلَهُ»: خاندان او و پیروان او (نگا: نمل / 56، قمر / 34).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: چنین بود که او و خانواده‌اش، همگی را، رهایی دادیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و به خاطر بیاور زمانی را که او و خاندانش را همگی نجات دادیم،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: هنگامی که رهانیدیم خود و خاندانش را همگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آنگاه كه او و همه خاندان او را رهانيديم،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: چون او را و همه‌ی کسانش را رهانیدیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Wherefore We saved him and his entire family

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: When We rescued him and his entire household.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: when We delivered him and his people all together,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Recall what time We delivered him and his household, all.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: When We saved him and his family, all,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: We saved him and his family, all of them.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: (Call to mind) when We delivered him and all his kinsfolk,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: When We saved him and his family, all,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: When We saved him and his household, every one,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: When We delivered him and all his family,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: We saved him and all his kinsmen,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: We rescued him and his whole family,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: When We delivered him and his followers, all--

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Ith najjaynahu waahlahu ajmaAAeena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: We saved him and all his people,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Behold, We delivered him and his adherents, all

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: مگر پیرزنی را که در میان باقی ماندگان [در شهر] بود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: مگر پيرزنى كه با مردم شهر بماند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: جز پيرزنى را كه در ميان باقى ماندگان [در عذاب‌] بود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: جز پيرزنى كه در ميان باقى‌ماندگان [و خاكسترشدگان‌] بود-

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: به جز پیر زالی (همسر او) که در میان قومی که هلاک شدند باقی ماند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: مگر پیرزنی (که همسر لوط بود و با کافران در اذیّت و آزار مؤمنان همکاری می‌کرد، و بدین سبب) از زمره‌ی هلاک شدگان گردید. [[«الْغَابِرِینَ»: هالکین. نابود شوندگان (نگا: اعراف / 83، حجر / 60).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: مگر پیرزنی که جزو واپس‌ماندگان [در عذاب‌] بود

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: مگر پیرزنی که از بازماندگان بود (و به سرنوشت آنان گرفتار شد)!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: مگر پیرزنی در بازماندگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: مگر پيرزنى را در ميان بازماندگان- عذاب‌شدگان-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: جز زنی سالخورده (و) ناتوان که در میان باقی‌ماندگان (از گمراهان) بود.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Except an old woman who was one of those who stayed behind.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Except an old woman, who became of those who stayed behind.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: save an old woman among those that tarried;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Save an old woman among the lingerers.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Except an old woman (his wife) who was among those who remained behind.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Except for an old woman who lagged behind.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: except for an old woman who was among those that stayed behind.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Except an old woman (his wife) who was among those who remained behind.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: excepting an old woman among those who remained behind,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: except an old woman who lingered,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: except for an old woman who remained behind.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Except an old woman (who was) amongst those who tarried.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Illa AAajoozan fee alghabireena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: except for an old woman who stayed behind,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Except an old woman who was among those who lagged behind:

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: سپس دیگران را هلاک کردیم،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: سپس ديگران را هلاك كرديم.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: سپس ديگران را هلاك نموديم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: سپس ديگران را هلاك كرديم.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پس (از نجات لوط و اهلش) دیگران که بدکار بودند همه را هلاک ساختیم.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آن گاه (که لوط و مؤمنان را نجات دادیم) دیگران را درهم کوبیدیم و نابود کردیم. [[«دَمَّرْنَا»: هلاک و نابود کردیم. در هم کوبیدیم (نگا: اعراف / 137، شعراء / 172).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: سپس دیگران را نابود کردیم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: سپس بقیه را نابود کردیم!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: سپس سرنگون ساختیم دگران را

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: سپس آن ديگران را هلاك كرديم.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: سپس دیگران را نابود کردیم.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Then We destroyed the others.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: We then destroyed the others.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: then We destroyed the others,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Then We annihilated the others.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Then We destroyed the rest [i.e. the towns of Sodom at the place of the Dead Sea (now) in Palestine]. [See the "Book of History" by Ibn Kathir].

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Then We annihilated the others.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Then We utterly destroyed the rest of them.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then We destroyed the rest.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Then We destroyed the others.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: We destroyed the rest.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and We destroyed the others.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then We destroyed the others.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Then We totally destroyed the others.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Then We destroyed the others.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Thumma dammarna alakhareena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and We destroyed the rest.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Then We destroyed the rest.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و شما همواره صبحگاهان [در مسیر سفرهایتان از کنار ویرانه های شهر] آنان گذر می کنید،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: شما بر آنها مى‌گذريد، بامدادان،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و در حقيقت شما بر [آثار] آنان صبحگاهان مى‌گذريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و در حقيقت، شما بر آنان صبحگاهان

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و شما مردم اینک بر دیار ویران قوم لوط می‌گذرید (و خرابه‌های آن را به چشم می‌نگرید) در صبح،

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و شما (ای اهل مکّه! در سَفَر تجارتی خود به سرزمین شام) بامدادان از سرزمین ایشان عبور می‌کنید (و پیوسته آثار ویران آنان را دید می‌زنید). [[«مُصْبِحِینَ»: به روز رسندگان. وارد صبح شدگان. حال است (نگا: حجر / 66 و 83).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و خود شما بر [آثار] آنان بامدادان می‌گذرید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و شما پیوسته صبحگاهان از کنار (ویرانه‌های شهرهای) آنها می‌گذرید...

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و هر آینه شما می‌گذرید بر ایشان بامداد

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هر آينه شما [اى قريش،] بامدادان بر [ويرانه‌] آنان مى‌گذريد- هنگامى كه كاروانهاى شما از حجاز به شام سفر مى‌كنند-

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و بی‌گمان، شما همواره بر آنان صبحگاهان

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: You pass by (their habitations) in the morning

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And indeed you pass over them in the morning. –

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and you pass by them in the morning

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And surely ye pass by them in the morning.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Verily, you pass by them in the morning.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: You pass by them in the morning.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: You pass by their desolate habitations in the morning

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Verily, you pass by them in the morning.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And lo! ye verily pass by (the ruin of) them in the morning

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Indeed you pass by them at dawn

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: You pass by them in the morning

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: You pass by (their ruined town) in the morning and at night.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And most surely you pass by them in the morning,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wainnakum latamurroona AAalayhim musbiheena

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: You pass by their ruins morning

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Verily, ye pass by their (sites), by day-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و نیز شبانگاهان، آیا تعقّل نمی کنید؟

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و شامگاهان. آيا تعقل نمى‌كنيد؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و نيز شامگاهان. آيا تعقل نمى‌كنيد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و شامگاهان مى‌گذريد! آيا به فكر فرو نمى‌رويد؟!

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و شام، آیا (چشم عبرت نمی‌گشایید و) عقل را کار نمی‌بندید؟

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و شامگاهان هم (مخروبه‌های شهر ایشان سدوم را می‌بینید). آیا نمی‌اندیشید و متوجّه نیستید (که بدکرداری و تباهکاری ایشان، موجب ویرانی سرزمینشان و بدفرجامی خودشان شده است؟). [[«بِالَّیْلِ»: حرف (ب) به معنی (فی) است. مراد از مُصْبِحِینَ و بِالَّیْلِ، رویهم، یعنی پیوسته و دائم.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و نیز شامگاهان، پس آیا تعقل نمی‌کنید؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و (همچنین) شبانگاه؛ آیا نمی‌اندیشید؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و به شب پس آیا بخرد نمی‌یابید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و شامگاهان نيز، آيا خرد را كار نمى‌بنديد؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و شامگاهان می‌گذرید! آیا پس خردورزی نمی‌کنید؟!

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Or at night. Then how is it you do not understand?

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And during the night; so do you not have sense?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and in the night; will you not understand?

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And at night. Will ye not therefore reflect?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And at night; will you not then reflect?

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And at night. Do you not understand?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and at night. Do you still not understand?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And at night; will you not then reflect

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And at night-time; have ye then no sense?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and at night. Do you not exercise your reason?

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and at night, will you not understand?

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And at night. Then will you not use reason?

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Will you then not understand?

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And at night; do you not then understand?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wabiallayli afala taAAqiloona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and night: will you not take heed?

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And by night: will ye not understand?

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و یونس از پیامبران بود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و يونس از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و همانا يونس از زمره‌ى فرستادگان بود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و در حقيقت، يونس از زمره فرستادگان بود.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و یونس نیز یکی از رسولان بزرگ خدا بود.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: مسلّماً یونس هم از زمره‌ی پیغمبران بود.

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و بی‌گمان یونس از پیامبران بود

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و یونس از رسولان (ما) است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و همانا یونس است از فرستادگان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و هر آينه يونس از پيامبران بود.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و به‌راستی، یونس همانا از زمره‌ی فرستادگان (ما) است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Verily Jonah is one of the apostles.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
